item.title: Install R
item.description: Which version of R? Bioconductor guidelines state: Package authors should develop against the version of R that will be available to users when the Bioconductor devel branch becomes the Bioconductor release branch. In addition: This means that, from mid-October through mid-April, Bioconductor developers should be developing against R-devel. From mid-April to mid-October, developers should use R-release (actually, the R snapshot from the R-x-y-branch) for Bioconductor development. R Sources or R binaries?
